types:type.name: Order

%dw 2.0
type Order = {| order_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, date: String, store_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, product_id: String, txn_id: String |} {"example": "{\\\"order_id\\\":21321,\\\"quantity\\\":123,\\\"date\\\":\\\"2\\/15\\/2022\\\",\\\"store_id\\\":5,\\\"product_id\\\":\\\"4565464231\\\",\\\"txn_id\\\":\\\"456541321\\\"}"}
